title: CELEBRATION OF LIFE
desc: Join us JANUARY, 24TH, 2016 for this celebratory event in Los Angeles, California, to highlight the achievements of human?rights defenders around the globe. An evening of music, poetry, and appearances by prominent?human rights advocates, their families and their celebrity supporters, to draw attention to?pervasive threats to human rights, which can be thwarted only with education and the freedom?to think critically. MPV?s? ?Celebration of Life? ?will present a novel interactive approach to raising awareness?about human rights heroes, with celebrity guests delivering a monologue?as the activists they are honoring.? The honorees will include:
